content.value:
Lulos Hostal Boutique is located in a colonial house in the traditional neighbourhood of San Antonio in Cali very close to Hotel Intercontinental Cali. This hostel is cosy and warm place to stay. It combines our local culture with local art.

This hostel is well located in San Antonio neighbourhood, surrounded by many tourist places and great gastronomic variety. San Antonio is a colonial and colourful place.

The house has four rooms, one private room and three shared rooms. The private room has a private bathroom and amenities. Each room shows through art our local culture.

Lulos Hostal Boutique offers accommodation in Cali.
Lulos Hostal Boutique features free WiFi throughout the property.
There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and gift shop at the property.

Bike hire is available at this hostel and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. Saint's Peter Cathedral is 600 m from Lulos Hostal Boutique, while Jorge Isaacs Theater is 800 m from the property. The nearest airport is Alfonso Bonilla Arag√≥n International Airport, 19 km from the property.

description.description: We offer an excellent accommodation service in a cozy and warm space, through art we teach natural and cultural wealth of our region and our country, creating a connection with the world, helping the practice of Spanish language, making stay an enriching experience, as well as, contributing to solve tourists needs.
